title: New Creator: Wax Motif
body:
[Name] 
Wax Motif

[Socials]
https://www.twitch.tv/waxmotif
https://twitter.com/waxmotif
http://instagram.com/waxmotif

[Info]
Established Electronic artist Wax Motif is known for educational music streams, production battles, and thumping basslines. Wax is a crypto enthusiast and has a fully leaned-in roadmap for his $WAXM coin including Discord bot and game integrations on top of music-related uses.

[Use Cases]
1) Distribution - Will do an airdrop to current twitch subs and discord fans with the amount based by channel points and discord rank
2) Holding Mechanics - Competition entry and giveaways for those holding certain amounts.  Amounts held will scale with Giveaways / Prizes ie: backstage meet n greet requires an account of 1000 coins or more.
3) Transactions - In stream transactions. ie: boosting entries to top of list.  Exclusive items / skins for sale w WAXM. Viewing Parties, Game Participation/tournaments, AMAs, live performances, birthday shoutouts

[Treasury Grant]
$1000

A 'yes' approves $WAXM and a $1000 gift coin treasury grant
A 'no' denies this approval
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
